text: "Nautilus" clarkanus is an extinct species of nautiloid. It lived during the Lower Carboniferous. Fossil specimens have been uncovered in the Spergen Hill Limestone formation of Indiana. ==References== * On the Fauna of the Lower Carboniferous limnestones of Spergen Hill, Ind., with a revision of the descriptions of its Fossils hitherto published, and illustrations of the species from the original type series Category:Prehistoric nautiloids Category:Carboniferous cephalopods Category:Carboniferous animals of North America
title: Nautilus clarkanus
